question: Which of the following Chola Kings constructed the Rajarajeshwara or Brihadesvara temple, dedicated to Shiva at Thanjavur?
explanation: Rajaraja I got constructed the Rajarajeshwara or Brihadesvara temple, dedicated to Shiva at Thanjavur (Tanjore) in c.1010 CE. This temple is also called the Rajaraja temple.
